description: The soft drinks giant says it has had to speed up its restructuring plan due to the coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Coca-Cola restructuring cuts 2,200 jobs worldwide
title_page: Coronavirus: Coca-Cola restructuring cuts 2,200 jobs worldwide - BBC News
maintext: About half of Coca-Cola's sales typically comes from consumers drinking its beverages away from home. Social restrictions to curb the spread of the virus have led to widespread closures of bars, restaurants, cinemas and sports stadiums where its drinks are sold.
